summary: Ernest Jennings Ford  was an American country music and gospel singer and actor.
full_text: Ernest Jennings Ford , known professionally as Tennessee Ernie Ford, was an American recording artist and television host who enjoyed success in the country and Western, pop and gospel musical genres. Noted for his rich bass-baritone voice and down-home humor, he is remembered for his hit recordings of "The Shotgun Boogie" and "Sixteen Tons".
title: Tennessee Ernie Ford
